comments:
1. Have a PHP project in the PHP Explorer view
2. Open the Menu of the PHP Explorer toolbar
3. Select Show > Working Sets
4. Open the Menu again and select Show > Projects
5. Right click on the project
6. Select the option Close Project

Result : Error in the log

Error
Thu Sep 27 18:37:31 EEST 2007
Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.core.resources".

java.lang.NullPointerException

Afterward, other actions made in the PHP Explorer view bring new errors in the Error log(like close again a project, add a file to the project by drag and drop, add New PHP File, Add New Class - critical issue, because you can not add a class, it gaves errors every time you try to add a class )
Fixed. Include node for the removed project should not be created.
